document_data.name: The Splintered Stair
document_data.mainbody: The '''Splintered Stair''' was an [[inn]] located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The inn was located on the east side of [[Gut Alley]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] in between the intersections of [[Drawn Sword Alley]] and [[Adder Lane]].
document_data.Description: A large spiraling staircase overlooked by balconies dominated the entry of the inn. The stairway was badly damaged during an epic brawl between [[adventurer]]s, giving the inn its name. The rooms for rent were large, but also dark and cold.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Splintered Stair was owned by [[Shalanna Duthmere]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
